os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 32-bit MS Windows (NT/2000/XP)
Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 64-bit MS Windows

name: ChkServices
short_description:
Do you want to check frequently some services running on your remote servers?

With ChkServices you can select the servers / services you want to check and also set the interval how often you want to recheck if the services still running.

Additionally you can start stop a selected service direct from the application.

For questions and new features just open a ticket or start a discussion.

No Installation necessary. Just download the tool and enter you domain-controller, username and password.

If you have problems using the tool please start a discussion and I will do my best to fix the problems. If you would like to add any features also post it.

**********************************************************************************************************
If you like the tool it would be also nice to get a little feedback or you write a review ;)
**********************************************************************************************************
summary: Check service stats, start / stop them
